name: Double Split Maxi
description:
Beautiful soft Haboti silk box cut maxi with high split on both sides. Drop arm detail and scoop neck detail.

Super soft so it drapes beautifully and floats while you walk!  

Each sweet danger garment is hand dyed and completely unique! So each design may vary slightly to the photos shown. Made in on the Isle of Lewis!



Fabric:

100% Haboti Silk


Colour:

Turquoise into Red.


Size: 

Small

Measurements taken with garment lying flat:

Length: 157cm (neck to hem) 
Width: 54 cm


Care:
 
Hand wash cold and line dry. 

Warm iron while damp.

name: Hi-Lo Maxi Cape
description:
Beautiful soft Haboti silk Hi-Lo maxi cape! Swooping wide scoop neck and side slit sleeves. Super soft so it drapes beautifully and floats while you walk!  

Each sweet danger garment is hand dyed and completely unique! So each design may vary slightly to the photos shown. Made in on the Isle of Lewis!



Fabric:

100% Haboti Silk


Colour:

Light blue/Black into a light plum.


Size: 

One Size


Care:
 
Hand wash cold and line dry. 

Warm iron while damp.

name: Hi-Lo Top/Mini Dress
description:
This beautiful soft Haboti silk Hi-Lo garment can be worn as a top or mini dress! Drop arm detail and scoop neck detail.

Super soft so it drapes beautifully and floats while you walk!  

Each sweet danger garment is hand dyed and completely unique! So each design may vary slightly to the photos shown. Made in on the Isle of Lewis!



Fabric:

100% Haboti Silk


Colour:

Sulphur/green/Royal Blue


Size: 

Small

Measurements taken with garment lying flat:

Length: 
Front: 38cm (neck to hem)
Width: 52cm
Back: 114cm (neck to hem)


Care:
 
Hand wash cold and line dry. 

Warm iron while damp.

name: Crop Top
description:
100% Silk Crop Top
This beautiful soft silk box cut crop top with swooping scoop neck and side slit sleeves is the perfect way to spice up an outfit! Each garment is hand dyed and completely unique, so each design may vary slightly to the photo shown.

Colour:

Turquoise into red.

All garments are handmade here on the Isle of Lewis.

Size: Medium

Measurements taken with garment lying flat- 
Length: 40cm (neck to hem) 
Width: 54cm

Care: 

Hand wash cold and line dry. Warm iron while damp.
